forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the skies lie mostly clear, offering a pavane of tranquility amidst the gentle stir of the south-southwest winds, caressing the city at a whisper. Shadows of the iconic skyline stretch against a backdrop just beginning to hint at the dawn to come. With a cool embrace, temperatures linger around fifty, inviting thoughts of light layers that could be comfortably discarded at the promise of a bright day.

Come Thursday, the sun will ascend its throne, radiating warmth unto the cityscape with temperatures inching towards the mid-sixties before gracefully retreating to the low sixties in the afternoon. The southwest breezes will dance more vigorously, possibly fluttering the pages of an open book or tousling hair during a stroll along the waterfront. While fog may lie low, somewhere beyond the golden spires of the Golden Gate Bridge, the day ahead promises clarity, perfect for quiet contemplation at a café or an artful meander through the streets. The weather, conducive to simple pleasures, calls for combining comfort and style—perhaps a light jacket over a casual shirt with well-chosen shoes ready to tread on San Francisco’s storied paths. Embrace the day ahead, a canvas of golden hues just waiting to be explored.
